text: - What's going on right now,
it's kind of a huge stampede.

Working with AWS is really the
key advantage that we have.
(playful music)

BrainBox AI, that's about using
our artificial intelligence

to reduce the energy of
the heating, cooling,

and ventilation of any
existing building up to 25%.
(upbeat music)

You've got all of these
companies pushing new models,

which are far better
than the previous version
every few months,

and the Bedrock solution
is quite interesting

because you don't have
to make this decision.
AWS is coming with that carousel
and a different model are being updated
as new models are released.
(upbeat music)
The capability to use multiple model
to answer one question

is probably the greatest
advantage of Bedrock.

One model was clearly
trained on HVAC information.

At the same time, we
could use another model
for another question

because we know for the
question on that specific angle,

another model would probably
have a better answer.
The way the technology at BrainBox works,
everything is based on data.
Data that we are extracting
either from the customer building
or from the external API sources
is really like the fuel training the AI,
so we're capable to have prediction.
So, that data for us is crucial.
The security around the AWS system

is guaranteeing that that
data is protected at all time.

In the very rapid pace
moving gen AI world,
working with AWS, that support
and the expertise that we had access to
was just making the difference.
(upbeat music)
